code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Footer(){const[name,setName]=useState("");const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[message,setMessage]=useState("");const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();alert("Message sent successfully!");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("footer",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Contact Us"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Name: "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Email: "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Message: "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{value:message,onChange:e=>setMessage(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Send Message"})]})]});}export default Footer;
